CrazyChess.logic

Class ExtraChecksAndTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • CrazyChess.logic.ExtraChecksAndTools

  • public class ExtraChecksAndTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to perform some extra checks and to provide some extra tools that might be useful further in the project. This class might be very useful for people making the AI because of methods like canCapture, capturableBy and possibleGamestatesAfterNextMove. This class also holds methods for checking for checks and checkmates. (should probably split it up in the future)
    Author:
    Darius

      • isInCheckmate

        public boolean isInCheckmate(java.lang.String color,
                             boolean isDebug,
                             AbstractPiece[][] gamestate,
                             int moveNo)
        This method checks if the player of specified color is in checkmate in the current game state
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player being examined for checkmate
        isDebug - is debug mode activated
        gamestate - game state to be examined
        moveNo - current move number
        Returns:
